General.Name: Daehan Green Power Corporation
General.Description: DGP Co.,Ltd. engages in the bio diesel and bio heavy oil, solar and wind power generation, and fuel cell generation businesses in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Daehan Green Power Corporation and changed its name to DGP Co.,Ltd. in April 2023. DGP Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yeonggwang-eup, South Korea.
